doc.title: Window
doc.desc: The Window class is a class for managing windows.

member.name: Window

argitem.name: parent
argitem.desc: Specifies the parent window. If a parent window is specified, it is created as its child window. If not specified, it is omitted.

member.desc: Constructs an object of the Window class. The window is created in a hidden state, and its position and size are undefined (an appropriate size at some position).

member.name: onMouseEnter
member.desc: Occurs when the mouse enters the client area of the window.

member.name: onMouseLeave
member.desc: Occurs when the mouse leaves the client area of the window.

member.name: onClick

argitem.name: x
argitem.desc: The x-coordinate (in client coordinates) of the position where the window was clicked.

argitem.name: y
argitem.desc: The y-coordinate (in client coordinates) of the position where the window was clicked.

member.desc: Occurs when the window is clicked.

member.name: onDoubleClick

argitem.name: x
argitem.desc: The x-coordinate (in client coordinates) of the position where the window was double-clicked.

argitem.name: y
argitem.desc: The y-coordinate (in client coordinates) of the position where the window was double-clicked.

member.desc: Occurs when the window is double-clicked.

member.name: onMouseDown

argitem.name: x
argitem.desc: The x-coordinate (in client coordinates) of the position where the mouse button was pressed.

argitem.name: y
argitem.desc: The y-coordinate (in client coordinates) of the position where the mouse button was pressed.

argitem.name: button
argitem.desc: The mouse button that was pressed. It will be one of the following values. mbLeft : The left mouse button was pressed mbMiddle : The middle mouse button was pressed mbRight : The right mouse button was pressed mbX1 : The first side button of the mouse was pressed mbX2 : The second side button of the mouse was pressed

argitem.name: shift
argitem.desc: The state of the modifier keys that were pressed simultaneously when the mouse button was pressed. It will be a combination of the following values by bitwise OR. ssAlt : The ALT key was pressed ssShift : The SHIFT key was pressed ssCtrl : The CTRL key was pressed

member.desc: Occurs when a mouse button is pressed.

member.name: onMouseUp

argitem.name: y
argitem.desc: The y-coordinate (in client coordinates) of the position where the mouse button was released.

argitem.name: button
argitem.desc: The mouse button that was released. It will be one of the following values. mbLeft : The left mouse button was released mbMiddle : The middle mouse button was released mbRight : The right mouse button was released mbX1 : The first side button of the mouse was released mbX2 : The second side button of the mouse was released

argitem.name: shift
argitem.desc: The state of the modifier keys that were pressed simultaneously when the mouse button was released. It will be a combination of the following values by bitwise OR. ssAlt : The ALT key was pressed ssShift : The SHIFT key was pressed ssCtrl : The CTRL key was pressed

member.desc: Occurs when a mouse button is released.
